title: Discovery process throws exception when CollectionBehaviour is set to PerClass

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: A fault in an existing feature

body:
Hi,

When this code is present: 

```
CollectionBehavior(CollectionBehavior.CollectionPerClass)]
```

the following exception is thrown

```
Server stack trace: 
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentOutOfRangeException()
   at System.Collections.Generic.List`1.get_Item(Int32 index)
   at Xunit.Sdk.XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.GetTestCollectionFactoryType(IAttributeInfo collectionBehavior) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.cs:line 211
   at Xunit.Sdk.XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.GetTestCollectionFactory(IAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, IAttributeInfo collectionBehaviorAttribute) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.cs:line 194
   at Xunit.Sdk.XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer..ctor(IAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, ISourceInformationProvider sourceProvider, IXunitTestCollectionFactory collectionFactory, IMessageAggregator messageAggregator) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.cs:line 57
   at Xunit.Sdk.XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer..ctor(IAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, ISourceInformationProvider sourceProvider) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\XunitTestFrameworkDiscoverer.cs:line 32
   at Xunit.Sdk.XunitTestFramework.GetDiscoverer(IAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\XunitTestFramework.cs:line 43
   at Xunit.Sdk.TestFrameworkProxy.GetDiscoverer(IAssemblyInfo assembly) in c:\Code\xUnit\xunit\src\xunit.execution\Sdk\Frameworks\TestFrameworkProxy.cs:line 65
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.StackBuilderSink._PrivateProcessMessage(IntPtr md, Object[] args, Object server, Object[]& outArgs)
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.StackBuilderSink.SyncProcessMessage(IMessage msg)

Exception rethrown at [0]: 
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.HandleReturnMessage(IMessage reqMsg, IMessage retMsg)
   at System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.PrivateInvoke(MessageData& msgData, Int32 type)
   at Xunit.Abstractions.ITestFramework.GetDiscoverer(IAssemblyInfo assembly)
   at Xunit.Xunit2Discoverer..ctor(ISourceInformationProvider sourceInformationProvider, IAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, String assemblyFileName, String xunitExecutionAssemblyPath, String configFileName, Boolean shadowCopy)
   at Xunit.XunitFrontController.CreateInnerController()
   at Xunit.XunitFrontController.get_InnerController()
   at Xunit.XunitFrontController.Find(Boolean includeSourceInformation, IMessageSink messageSink, ITestFrameworkOptions options)
   at Xunit.Runner.VisualStudio.TestAdapter.VsTestRunner.DiscoverTests(IEnumerable`1 sources, IDiscoveryContext discoveryContext, IMessageLogger logger, ITestCaseDiscoverySink discoverySink)
[xUnit.net 00:00:00.1511645] Discovery complete
========== Discover test finished: 0 found (0:00:00.2060754) ==========
```

I had a look at the code and it feels like a missing if in GetTestCollectionFactoryType method. ctrArgs has only one item.  Current workaround is to simply not specify this as it's the default value anyway.
